statements: SELECT * FROM space_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM space_inventory WHERE location='Storage';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM space_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM space_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM space_inventory ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM space_inventory WHERE location = 'Storage' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM space_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM space_inventory WHERE quantity < 5 AND location = 'Room 1' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity FROM space_inventory WHERE equipment_name ILIKE 'des%' OR location ILIKE '%hall%' ORDER BY quantity DESC, equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM space_inventory WHERE location IN ('Room 2', 'Storage') ORDER BY location DESC, equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, location FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, supplier FROM supplies WHERE supplier LIKE '%LLC%' ORDER BY supply_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 AND location='Warehouse A';
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory INNER JOIN supplies ON inventory.item_name = supplies.supply_name WHERE supplies.quantity > 50;
SELECT supply_name, supplier FROM supplies WHERE quantity < 20 AND supplier LIKE '%LLC%';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%' OR location='Warehouse B';
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, price FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT supply_name, supplier, expiration_date FROM supplies WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_id, item_type, location FROM inventory WHERE location <> 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT supply_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM supplies WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, price FROM equipment WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE in_stock = TRUE AND location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY item_type ASC, item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT purchase_id, item_id, supplier_id, purchase_date, quantity_purchased FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity_purchased, purchase_date FROM inventory JOIN purchases ON inventory.item_id = purchases.item_id;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM equipment ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT equipment_id, warehouse_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, category FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT e.name, s.name as supplier, o.order_date FROM equipment e JOIN orders o ON e.id = o.equipment_id JOIN suppliers s ON o.supplier_id = s.id;
SELECT SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM inventory WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT e.name, w.location as warehouse_location, i.quantity FROM equipment e JOIN inventory i ON e.id = i.equipment_id JOIN warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.id;
